title: Java Quotes App (K8S Resilient)
description: A production-ready cloud-native application featuring self-healing capabilities through Liveness and Readiness probes. Optimized for minimal footprint with resilient orchestration.

title: Chattingo App
description: A full-stack real-time chat application built with React, Spring Boot, and WebSocket technology. Containerized using Docker and deployed via a Jenkins CI/CD pipeline.
